Package cz2002.rrpss

Class Restaurant

Object
Restaurant
public class Restaurant extends Object
Restaurant is the main class used to run the Restaurant Reservation and Point of Sale System (RRPSS)
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicole

    private static String
    dateFormatString
    The standard format for a date input, given in 2 digit day of month (dd), 2 digit month of year (MM), and 4 digit year of era (YYYY).
    private static String
    dateTimeFormatString
    The standard format for a datetime input, given in 2 digit day of month (dd), 2 digit month of year (MM), 4 digit year of era (YYYY), 2 digit hour of day (0-23) (HH), and minute of hour (mm).

  • Field Details

    • dateFormatString

      private static final String dateFormatString
      The standard format for a date input, given in 2 digit day of month (dd), 2 digit month of year (MM), and 4 digit year of era (YYYY). e.g. 10/07/2004
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • dateTimeFormatString

      private static final String dateTimeFormatString
      The standard format for a datetime input, given in 2 digit day of month (dd), 2 digit month of year (MM), 4 digit year of era (YYYY), 2 digit hour of day (0-23) (HH), and minute of hour (mm). e.g. 10/07/2004 00:30
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • staffList

      private ArrayList<Staff> staffList
      The list of Staff employed by the restaurant.

    • menu

      private Menu menu
      The Menu of this restaurant.

    • tableMgr

      private TableManager tableMgr
      The TableManager of this restaurant.

    • orderMgr

      private OrderManager orderMgr
      The OrderManager of this restaurant.

    • resMgr

      private ReservationManager resMgr
      The ReservationManager of this restaurant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Restaurant

      public Restaurant()
      Class constructor. Initialises staffList, menu, and tableMgr with test data.

  • Method Details

    • inputCustomer

      private Customer inputCustomer​(Scanner sc)
      Requests user to input customer data (name, contact, membership), validates inputs, creates and returns Customer object.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to request inputs
      Returns:
      newly created customer object

    • inputDate

      private LocalDate inputDate​(Scanner sc)
      Requests user to input date based on DateFormatString validates inputs, creates and returns LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to request inputs
      Returns:
      newly created LocatDate object

    • inputDateTime

      private LocalDateTime inputDateTime​(Scanner sc)
      Requests user to input datetime based on DateTimeFormatString validates inputs, creates and returns LocalDateTime object. Input time is restricted to hour (e.g. 23:00, not 23:36).
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to request inputs
      Returns:
      newly created LocatDateTime object

    • inputMenuItem

      private MenuItem inputMenuItem​(Scanner sc, boolean isAlaCarte, boolean isPromo)
      Requests user to input MenuItemID validates input, gets and returns associated MenuItem object.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to request inputs
      isAlaCarte - true if MenuItemID of AlaCarte objects should be accepted, false otherwise.
      isPromo - true if MenuItemID of Promotion objects should be accepted, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      associated MenuItem object

    • inputPax

      private int inputPax​(Scanner sc)
      Requests user to input number of people, validates input, and and returns input.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to request inputs
      Returns:
      number of people (pax)

    • runRRPSS

      public void runRRPSS()
      Function to run Restaurant Reservation and Point of Sale System (RRPSS). Displays main menu options to manage restaurant, and executes the appropriate functions based on user inputs.
